name: Desire For Gold
description:
You're a famous Thief wanted, dead or alive, in almost every known part of the world. After a successful robbery of The Grand Palace's Vault, the most secured treasure, a true medal and achievement worthy of legendary thief, you've decided to go even bigger than that! 

Your next target is a mystical treasure hidden deep in Cursed Royal Dungeons. Legends say that many honorable, and not so, men and women tried to retrieve treasures hidden there but all of them failed miserably, becoming new guardians of secrets kept there...

Here arrives you, a Thief with abilities to easily slip a crown from the king's own head without him noticing. What a challenge it would be to steal treasures not only from living things but also those from The Underworld!

Are you ready to become a world's (and The Underworld) famous Thief?
